item.title: EP 223 - The Ouija Murders
item.itunes:title: The Ouija Murders
item.description:
Today we meet either a serial killer or an extremely unlucky man, and then we turn off the lights and talk about Ouija board inspired murders!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Traveling carnival worker admits to killing two Tennessee women, Georgia teen, police say

https://www.knoxnews.com/story/news/crime/2019/05/13/carnival-worker-charged-killing-two-tennessee-women-georgia-teen/1193988001/

 

How Tennessee police stumbled upon a carnival worker suspected of killing 3 women

https://www.knoxnews.com/story/news/crime/2019/05/15/how-tennessee-police-helped-catch-carnival-worker-james-michael-wright-charged-killing-3-women/3668965002/

 

Death From Beyond: Bizarre Cases of Ouija Board Killings

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2017/01/death-from-beyond-bizarre-cases-of-ouija-board-killings/

 

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
